instruction: Describe the relationship between the two countries mentioned in the article.
input: The Trump Administration’s latest set of sanctions against North Korea has only served to worsen the already tense relations between the two countries. With the latest missile test, North Korea has made it clear that it has no plans of relenting on its aggressive military and nuclear ambitions.
output: The relationship between the two countries is tense and has been further aggravated by the Trump Administration's latest sanctions.
